name: Software Engineer
description: Led the implementation of a customer retention system for insurance cancellations, achieving a 30% retention rate.
Successfully integrated an external payment gateway, facilitating an average of 15 daily payments for overdue installments.
Coordinated the production launch of a new vehicle insurance product in an open channel, achieving an average of 100 daily sales.

name: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained feature-rich applications using frameworks such as AngularJS, React, .NET, and .NET Core, leveraging a diverse skill set encompassing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, C#, Python, and PHP.
Led a team in successfully refactoring a critical feature in our largest project, resulting in enhanced maintainability and scalability.
Led a team to refactor the most-used endpoint, reducing response time from 5 seconds to under 1 second through pagination, code cleanup, and optimized database queries

name: Teacher Assistant
description: Led interactive sessions by guiding students through consultations and project presentations using tools like GitHub and Visual Studio, exploring implemented algorithms.
Directed teams under agile methodology by acting as PO and SM, guiding teams in defining project visions, user stories, task prioritization, and obstacle resolution.
Evaluated innovative projects by assessing progress and deliverables, covering software architecture, interfaces, data persistence, graph generation, and feedback, utilizing the Scrum framework.

name: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed and deployed machine learning features using Django framework for a gig-based website project.
Implemented a classification model utilizing natural language processing and GCP, leading to a 20% increase in interactions between freelancers and clients.
Created a recommendation model that analyzed user preferences and job requirements
Awarded for the best project in competition among more than 50 interns.
